r.d:
This is an extension to efficiently schedule I/O, time and signal based events using the best I/O notification mechanism available for specific platform. This is a port of libevent to the PHP infrastructure.
Version 1.0.0 introduces: * new OO API breaking backwards compatibility * support of libevent 2+ including HTTP, DNS, OpenSSL and the event listener.
Note, event-1.0.0 and greater is not compatible with previous versions.
r.n: Added support for in-tree build (PR https://bitbucket.org/osmanov/pecl-event/pull-requests/18/support-in-tree-build by dixyes) Fixed tests/27-event-util-create-socket_php8.phpt on macOS
